## RumInitConfiguration.trackUserInteractions property

Enables automatic collection of users actions. See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/browser/tracking_user_actions" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Tracking User Actions</a> for further information.  true

**Signature:**

```typescript
trackUserInteractions?: boolean | undefined;
```
